messages.message:
Hi Team,
Even though I haven’t selected any files, clicking *Start Upload* displays a message saying the files were uploaded successfully. I’m not sure if this is already a known behavior.

cc : @Nithin

yeah i see that we don’t check for the case where `numFiles` is 0 here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/0194787/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/lib/src/IBUploadManager/utils/useUpload.ts#L77)

i don’t think we’re making bug fixes for old platform code though
